name: extract_data_from_json
description: Extracts specific fields from a JSON file and returns the data as a list of dictionaries. The function can handle both single JSON objects and lists of JSON objects, and allows for limiting the number of results returned.

file_path.description: The path to the JSON file from which to extract data.

keys.description: The fields to extract from the JSON data. Can be a single field name (string) or a list of field names (array).

output_path.description: Optional path to save the query result. Supported formats: .csv, .xlsx, .json, .jsonl

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. If null, all items are returned.
